report.title: Groups list
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM groups g LEFT JOIN groups_users guc ON guc.group_id=g.id AND guc.deleted=false and guc.pending=false LEFT JOIN groups_users gucp ON gucp.group_id=g.id AND gucp.deleted=false and gucp.pending=true LEFT JOIN groups_users gu ON gu.group_id=g.id AND gu.deleted=false AND gu.user_id=#currentUser# LEFT JOIN group_pages gp ON gp.group_id=g.id AND gp.deleted=false AND (((gp.administrator=false OR gu.administrator=true) and gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=false) OR gp.administrator is null) #joins# WHERE g.deleted = false AND ( -- user is admin, or group within defined date range (gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=false AND gu.administrator=true) or (g.from_date is null or g.from_date<=now()) and (g.to_date is null or g.to_date>now()-'1 day'::interval) ) AND #website_filter#

param.name: userFilterMode
param.description: Include which groups for the user?
param.lookup_values: all:All groups,joinable:Groups they can join or request,allvisible:Groups they can join or request or are already a member of,pending:Groups they are pending approval to join,member:Groups they are a member of,admin:Groups they administer,create:Groups they created,create_admin:Groups they created or administer

wheres.where: gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=true
gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=false
gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=false AND gu.administrator=true
gu.id is not null AND gu.created_by_id=#currentUser#
gu.id is not null AND (gu.created_by_id=#currentUser# OR gu.administrator=true)

param.name: group_type_id
param.description: Limit the report to a certain type of group

param.name: from_group_id
param.description: Only include groups which are linked to from another group (e.g. an organisation which parents a list of projects).
param.join: JOIN group_relations grfrom ON grfrom.to_group_id=g.id AND grfrom.from_group_id=#from_group_id# AND grfrom.deleted=false

param.name: pending_path
param.description: Path to the page which will let admins handle pending requests, e.g. /groups/pending?group_id=

column.name: administrator
column.sql: gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=false AND gu.administrator=true

column.name: pending
column.sql: gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=true

column.name: member
column.sql: gu.id is not null AND gu.pending=false

column.name: canrequestorjoin
column.sql: gu.id is null and g.joining_method in ('R','P')

column.name: role
column.sql: case when gu.administrator=true then 'Administrator' when gu.id is not null and gu.pending=false then 'Member' when gu.id is not null and gu.pending=true then 'Awaiting approval' else 'Non-member' end

column.name: joining_method
column.sql: case g.joining_method when 'P' then 'Yes' when 'R' then 'By request only' when 'I' then 'By invite only' end

column.name: members
column.sql: count(DISTINCT guc.user_id)::varchar || case when count(DISTINCT gucp.user_id)>0 and gu.administrator=true and '#pending_path#'<>'' then ' (' || count(DISTINCT gucp.user_id)::varchar || ' pending)' else '' end

column.name: pages
column.sql: array_to_string(array_agg(distinct '' || gp.caption || ''), ' ')
